live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53572.summary: Some customers in the Ridgewood South area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53572.title: Sept 22 - Winnipeg (Ridgewood South) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
53569.summary: Some customers in Nanaimo (Cedar/South Wellington) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53569.title: Sept 21 – Nanaimo (Cedar/South Wellington) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
